title: Answer Product Availability Call
description: A customer calls the store to ask if a specific item is in stock.

tasks.description: Get the product name or item number from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent understands which product to look for.

tasks.description: Use the inventory management system to look up the item's current on-hand quantity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the current stock level for the item.

tasks.description: Inform the customer whether the item is in stock and offer to hold it for them.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent accurately answers the customer's question and provides helpful service.
